sentences.en: Ah, a gift from a doting grandmother, of course.
sentences.cn: 啊, 原来是溺爱孙女的祖母给的礼物.

sentences.en: Blame it doting parents, teachers and coaches.
sentences.cn: 要怪溺爱这一代的父母 、 老师和辅导员.

sentences.en: Fathers in their 30 s and 40 s still feel a bit ashamed of being a doting parent.
sentences.cn: 一些三、四十岁的爸爸仍然有点羞于宠爱孩子,我们想改变这种观念.

sentences.en: His doting parents bought him his first racing bike at 13.
sentences.cn: 溺爱他的父母在他13岁时给他买了第一辆自行车跑车。

sentences.en: Nun erz ? hle mir doch schon , was geschehen ist, und spann mich nicht so auf die Folter!
sentences.cn: 别折磨人了, 快告诉我,我的损失究竟有多大?

sentences.en: She is very smart , even accept that I am such a doting grandmother.
sentences.cn: 的确, 我相当宠爱这个孩子,但她也确实非常伶俐.

sentences.en: The doting & growing series of Beijing people accord with the fixed program for this city.
sentences.cn: 北京人的成长 及 衰老的过程都符合这座城市设定的程式.

sentences.en: When he grows a little taller, doting parents will trade in football lessons for basketball coaching.
sentences.cn: 等他再长高一点, 宠溺的家长将会把足球课程换成篮球训练.

trans.tran_cn: 老糊涂的，溺爱的，偏爱的
trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is, for example, a doting mother, husband, or friend, you mean that they show a lot of love for someone

trans.tran_cn: 溺爱，宠爱，过分地喜爱( dote的现在分词 )
